radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent regions of ground-glass in the lungs most likely due to atelectasis; lung bases otherwise clear. Dilated appendix to 15 mm, fluid-filled with hyperemia of the wall, surrounded by fatty stranding. Unremarkable liver, gallbladder, spleen, kidneys, adrenal glands, pancreas, stomach, and small bowel. A few scattered diverticula noted in the colon without evidence of diverticulitis. No free intraperitoneal fluid or air, and no intra-abdominal adenopathy.
